Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) is considered as a promising energy generation source in the future integrated energy system due to its high efficiency and flexibility in the combined cooling, heating and power (CCHP, tri-generation) system.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: However, optimization of the economic day-ahead scheduling is challenging due to various couplings between the energy storage components.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: To this end, an economic day-ahead scheduling model is proposed for the SOFC-based integrated tri-generation energy system (ITES), based on which dynamic programming (DP) is introduced for efficient solution.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: Considering the predicted cooling/heating/electric load profiles, the proposed dispatching optimization problem is constructed and solved by minimizing the fuel consumption subject to various device safety constraints.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: Simulation results based on a typical load scenario demonstrate the feasibility and efficiency of the proposed optimization method.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: It is revealed that the ITES with hybrid electrical and thermal energy storage units can not only achieve higher overall efficiency than the system with a single energy storage unit, but also significantly reduce the running time of the energy conversion devices.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage

Sentencas: The proposed optimization framework in this paper can efficiently coordinate the operation among the energy generation, conversion and consumption components, depicting a promising prospect in the application of future ITES.
Titulo: Dynamic programming based economic day-ahead scheduling of integrated tri-generation energy system with hybrid energy storage
